quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
author: Robert F. Kennedy

quote: Failure is just information and an opportunity to change your course.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Forget mistakes. Forget failure. Forget everything except what you are going to do now and do it. Today is your lucky day!
author: Og Mandino

quote: He who fails to plan, plans to fail.
author: Unknown

quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: People who avoid failure also avoid success.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The key to success is failure.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The number one cause of failure is the fear of failure.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: A minute's success pays the failure of years.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: an action committed in anger is an action doomed to failure.
author: Genghis Khan

quote: Goodness is the only investment that never fails.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Where words fail, music speaks.
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: Don't be afraid of missing opportunities. Behind every failure is an opportunity somebody wishes they had missed.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Failure is an option, fear is not.
author: James Cameron

quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying. There is no defeat except from within, no insurmountable barrier except our own inherent weakness of purpose.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Scared people want comfort and certainty so they avoid failure. People living fully seek challenges because this is where they feel alive.
author: Maxime Lagace

quote: A mistake is only an error, it becomes a mistake when you fail to correct it.
author: John Lennon

quote: Failure is acceptable. Not trying is a whole different ball park.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Most people fail in life because they major in minor things.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Failure is a great teacher. If you're open to it every mistake has a lesson to offer.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Failure is feedback. Learn from it and move on.
author: Jack Butcher

quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
author: Herman Melville

quote: The season of failure is the best time for sowing the seeds of success.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Make failure your teacher, not your undertaker.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Never feel shame for trying and failing, for he who has never failed is he who has never tried.
author: Og Mandino

quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Falling down is not failure. Failure comes when you stay where you have fallen.
author: Socrates

quote: Failure is the highway to success.
author: Og Mandino

quote: If you want to change how you see your problems, you have to change what you value and/or how you measure failure/success.
author: Mark Manson

quote: Have a vision, trust yourself, break some rules, ignore the naysayers, don't be afraid to fail.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Failure means you've now learned another valuable lesson that pushes you one step closer to success.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: If you're not failing every now and again, it's a sign you're not doing anything very innovative.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
author: John Wooden

quote: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Failure is a prerequisite for great success. If you want success faster, double your rate of failure.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Failure is not fatal, but failure to change might be.
author: John Wooden

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: When you view failure as feedback, you get more done. When you view failure as a finality, you get nothing done.
author: Jack Butcher
